integrations.quickbooksDescription: Connect your QuickBooks Online account to sync customers, invoices, payments, and more
integrations.quickbooksConnectInstructions: Click the button below to connect your QuickBooks account. You'll be redirected to QuickBooks to authorize the connection.
integrations.quickbooksBenefits: QuickBooks is a popular accounting software. By connecting, you can automatically sync financial data between Innexar and QuickBooks.
integrations.syncCustomersDescription: Automatically sync customer data between Innexar and QuickBooks
integrations.autoSyncDescription: Automatically sync data at regular intervals
